text: the security role at aws is extremely
interesting instead of being considered
the gatekeepers to innovation which most
security teams would normally be looked
at at aws it's my job to work with
industry defining technologies and
security innovation to show our
customers how they can use our services
to be secure and compliant
[Music]
hi my name is kimberly i'm a specialist
security architect at amazon web
services taking care of customers across
southeast asia when you speak to cyber
professionals you find that we're a
little bit more curious in nature it's
not just enough for us to actually see
an application works it's important for
us to understand the how and the why and
that's what really drew me to cyber
security the well-architected framework
has a pillar that i specialize in which
is the security pillar so my job is to
assess a customer's security posture
against a well-architected framework to
ensure that the applications and
workloads are secure so some of the
common questions that i normally get
from my customers especially if they're
new users of aws is how can i make sure
that my data my customer content is
actually kept secure one of the key
things that i tell my customer is that
security is always job zero at aws
before we actually allow our customers
to use any of our services you can be
sure that aws imbues very strong
technical controls to ensure that our
services are completely secure for our
customers to actually use and to rely
upon we have 24x7 security monitoring to
ensure that our customer content is
always kept secure
we look for builders who have a lifelong
commitment to learning
security is a constantly iterating
process so we look for people who are
not afraid of trying out new
technologies as well as to show
organizations to use these technologies
to ensure that they remain secure and
compliant
come build the future with aws
[Music]
